parameters.name: ClusterArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration.

parameters.name: ConnectivityInfo
parameters.description: Information about the broker access configuration. PublicAccess (dict) --- Public access control for brokers. Type (string) --- The value DISABLED indicates that public access is turned off. SERVICE_PROVIDED_EIPS indicates that public access is turned on. VpcConnectivity (dict) --- VPC connectivity access control for brokers. ClientAuthentication (dict) --- Includes all client authentication information for VPC connectivity. Sasl (dict) --- SASL authentication type details for VPC connectivity. Scram (dict) --- Details for SASL/SCRAM client authentication for VPC connectivity. Enabled (boolean) --- SASL/SCRAM authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity. Iam (dict) --- Details for SASL/IAM client authentication for VPC connectivity. Enabled (boolean) --- SASL/IAM authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity. Tls (dict) --- TLS authentication type details for VPC connectivity. Enabled (boolean) --- TLS authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity.

nested_params.name: Type
nested_params.description: The value DISABLED indicates that public access is turned off. SERVICE_PROVIDED_EIPS indicates that public access is turned on.

nested_params.name: VpcConnectivity
nested_params.description: VPC connectivity access control for brokers.

nested_params.name: ClientAuthentication
nested_params.description: Includes all client authentication information for VPC connectivity.

nested_params.name: Sasl
nested_params.description: SASL authentication type details for VPC connectivity.

nested_params.name: Scram
nested_params.description: Details for SASL/SCRAM client authentication for VPC connectivity.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: SASL/SCRAM authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity.

nested_params.name: Iam
nested_params.description: Details for SASL/IAM client authentication for VPC connectivity.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: SASL/IAM authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity.

nested_params.name: Tls
nested_params.description: TLS authentication type details for VPC connectivity.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: TLS authentication is on or off for VPC connectivity.

parameters.name: CurrentVersion
parameters.description: The version of the MSK cluster to update. Cluster versions aren't simple numbers. You can describe an MSK cluster to find its version. When this update operation is successful, it generates a new cluster version.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterOperationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster operation.
